name: NSTextList
desc: A section of text that forms a single list.

items.name: var markerFormat: NSTextList.MarkerFormat
items.desc: Returns the marker format string used by the receiver.

items.name: func marker(forItemNumber: Int) -> String
items.desc: Returns the computed value for a specific ordinal position in the list.

items.name: var listOptions: NSTextList.Options
items.desc: Returns the list options mask value of the receiver.

items.name: var startingItemNumber: Int
items.desc: Sets the starting item number for the text list.

items.name: static var prependEnclosingMarker: NSTextList.Options
items.desc: Specifies that a nested list should include the marker for its enclosing superlist before its own marker.
